#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int gcd(int a,int b)
{
if(b==0)
return a;
return gcd(b,a%b);
}

int main() {
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
	int n,m;
	cin>>n>>m;
	if(n==1)
	cout<<m<<"\n";
	else if(m==1)
	cout<<n<<"\n";
	else
	{
	int p=n-1;
	int q=m-1;
	int g=gcd(p,q);
	p=p/g;q=q/g;
	int ans=1+min((n-1)/p,(m-1)/q);
	cout<<ans<<"\n";
	}
	}
	return 0;
}
